channel.description: Recent content in Côtes Du Rhône on Decanted

item.title: Côtes Du Rhône Vidal-Fleury
item.description: Nothing too special about this wine. It’s a cheap GSM blend. This was my first real experience of a Côte Du Rhône. It wasn’t great, but definitely got me interested in the region. I’v got a few bottles from this region on my wishlist. Tasting Notes Medium-dark ruby in color Lost of dark fruit—blackberry, Plumb, raspberry Jammy, overripe, cooked fruit flavors (Maybe a hot vintage) A hint of rubber/plastic Dry, not much residual sugar Medium-plus body Medium-plus acidity almost juicy Medium-plus alcohol Light presence of tannin, no signs of oak
